ValidationRule.description: Exceptions cannot be edited on approved application. When not approved , only Credit users may edit this field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT($Permission.Bypass_Validation), ISCHANGED(Exception__c), RecordType.Name = 'Loan',
OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(Opportunity__r.Application_Status__c), 'Approved'),
AND( NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(Opportunity__r.Application_Status__c),'Approved')), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, 'Credit')) ) )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Exceptions cannot be edited on approved application. When not approved , only Credit users may edit this field.
